name: In Your Nightmares!
description:
A horror game based on an environment where you have to survive and complete tasks to pass all the game's stages until the end.

Nightmares is the dynamic horror indie game that gets inside your nightmares. You will wake up in your first nightmare, and that's where the journey begins, you will face five nightmares throughout the game, all different, and with different goals.

Immersive, psychological horror-oriented story: play to complete all the challenges proposed in the nightmares and come out alive.
All nightmares have a time limit, you have to pay close attention so that time doesn't run out before completing the challenges.

Terrifying gameplay: Run away from the monsters that will chase you, and complete the challenges.
Battles against Demons: Defeat the demons and overcome your fears.

- Five Nightmares! You Must Survive.

1 - You have to survive the nightmares.

2 - Be careful.

3 - Do not make noise.

4 - Do not give up.

5 - You only have 10 minutes.

Can you do this?

This is a survival horror game where in each level you have a goal that you must reach, keep an eye on the clock, every level you will have just a few minutes to complete it while a monster goes after you.
